questions.text: Can you drop out of school to follow your dreams?

options.text: If it would be worth it, yes

questions.text: How good are you with people?

options.text: Only with those I find attractive
I can talk a dying man out of dying

questions.text: Which is your strongest selling point?

options.text: My passion for what I do

questions.text: Choose: work on your own or find a job

options.text: I work better on my own

questions.text: What attracts you to a person?
You are to address an angry mob, you...

options.text: Do my best to appease them

questions.text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how honest are you with friends?

results.description: You are a bunch of talent, very sarcastic though callous sometimes. You love for materialistic things are of the charts, a visionary and you are quite unlucky with women/men.

You love to have fun as much as time allows you. You are more open to people you consider friends which you prank quite often. You are the most sarcastic of your friends. You are a brutally honest person.

Your are an introvert, an unstoppable goal chaser and a willing heart to do what it takes to achieve your dreams. You have such a high resistance level to anger outbursts with a limit though. If only you could just realise the amount of unrealised potential you have if only you get out your comfort zone.
You are on confident at the same time, arrogant individual. You make a great orator, negotiator and an awesome company representative.

People especially your friends think you are impressionable to which you refuse to believe though it is true. You are a go getter with opportunistic tendencies. You are a spendthrift and you often make poor choices (business - wise especially). You can also be easily deceived and exploited.

You are strongly attracted to a person who is more focused then you are, you see yourself in them and so help the person achieve their goal, You are meek, reserved, unbelievably optimistic, selfless and could be awkward too.
